# Fito - Music Producer & Artist

## ID Card
- **Name:** Fito (stylized as FITO)
- **Role:** Music Producer, Artist, Composer
- **Genre:** Electronic, Indie, Ambient, Atmospheric, Cinematic
- **Key Traits:** Atmospheric soundscapes, emotional depth, dark synths, cinematic progression
- **Website:** https://fito-music.github.io/

## Bio
Fito is an electronic music producer known for crafting immersive, atmospheric soundscapes that blend cinematic depth with modern electronic pulse. His music creates a "dark but hopeful" vibe, often featuring lush synthesizer textures, deep basslines, and emotive melodies. Perfect for focus, night drives, and deep introspection.

## Discography (Key Releases)
- **Lost In Your Light** (Album, 2026) - A journey through light and shadow.
- **No One Left To Forgive** (Single) - Melancholic and driving.
- **Windblown** (Single) - Airy, expansive, and rhythmic.
